page.title: 05Llanddulas school.
page.content: Our school is a new building,opened in 1975 by Mrs.Lyons,S.R.N.,on the site of the old Boys' School.We are a cont- rolled school,under the Church of Wales,since money for the first Ysgol Llanddulas came from the church.The Girls' school opened around 1864,and in 1941 the 2 schools were joined.The Girls' school became the dining hall. Today it is a private house,and David and Anthony Howe live there. We have a lovely hall for P.E. and lunches and services,a mobile class- room for an infant class,and a sports field.We have good football and net- ball teams,and this year we won the Athletics cup.We are planting seeds in the grounds,and we are starting a nat- ure trail for Environmental Studies.We have four teachers in school,and Mrs. Griffith takes the morning Nursery.
